interpreter_prompt.content:
Act as a prompt interpreter. Generate a concise prompt for the system based on requirements.

Commands:
(1) Summarize[] — get summary of requirements
(2) Finish[prompt] — return generated prompt

Last 100 words of requirements:
{input}

{history}

Command:

interpreter_prompt_json.content:
Act as a prompt interpreter. Generate a concise prompt for the system based on requirements.

Commands (JSON):
(1) {{"type": "Summarize", "content": ""}} — get summary of requirements
(2) {{"type": "Finish", "content": "prompt"}} — return generated prompt

Last 100 words of requirements:
{input}

{history}

Command:

interpreter_examples.content:
Summarize[]
Finish[Please tell me the weather in New York City.]

interpreter_examples_json.content:
{"type": "Summarize", "content": ""}
{"type": "Finish", "content": "Please tell me the weather in New York City."}
